add.description: This is the label for the 'Add' buttons.

block_element.description: Label for 'Block Element' context menu item

clickhide_instructions.message: After closing this popup, click (or right-click) an element on the page.

description.message: The free adblock tool for Chrome: Blocks annoying video ads on YouTube, Facebook ads, banners and much more.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Adblock Plus is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the Adblock Plus icon in the address bar or by typing the domain (not a URL) in the box and clicking the "Add domain" button.

enable_only_the.message: Enable only the filter lists you need. Too many can make Chrome unresponsive.

filter_must_follow_syntax.message: Your filter must follow the Adblock Plus filter syntax.

found_a_bug.message: Found a bug? Want to translate Adblock Plus into your language? Please file a request here.

last_updated_at.description: e.g. Last updated at 3:00pm on Apr 1, 2011

new_filters_added.message: New filters added; see Options to manage them.

remove_button.description: This is the label for the 'Remove selected' buttons.

subscriptionSelection_subscriptionSelect.message: Please choose a filter subscription from the list:
